name: de.uni.kn.colibri
description: Toolkit for Rapid Prototyping of Networking Across Realities for Research Prototypes

samples.description: Example on how to use Colibri's 'store' API to store / retrieve data from server.
Samples on how to use the PubSub methods for sending arbitrary data across the network to other lcients
Examples for using SyncBehaviour, which can be used to synchronize data models across a network (e.g., for using model-view-controller)
Example scene for SyncTransform script to sync location of objects between clients
Prefabs necessary for some features of Colibri (e.g., Remote Logging)
